item.title: Configure Email Using Mailgun
item.description: Have client create account in mailgun (with upgraded account by inputting credit card) Test email using test php sender Check in mailgun "Logs" More info in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-set-up-a-mail-relay-with-postfix-and-mailgun-on-ubuntu-16-04
